item.title: 三星电子任命移动业务主管为新任联席首席执行官
item.description: 三星电子周五表示，已任命其移动业务主管 TM Roh 为新任联席首席执行官兼设备体验部门主管，该部门负责管理公司的手机、电视和家电设备。【原文：Samsung Electronics said on Friday it has named its mobile chief TM Roh as a new co-CEO and head of its device experience division, which oversees the company's mobile phone, TV and home appliance devisions.】

item.title: 日本 10 月出口增长，美国销售下滑有所缓解
item.description: 日本政府周五公布的数据显示，日本 10 月份出口连续第二个月增长，原因是近期美国货运量下滑的趋势有所缓解。【原文：Japan's exports rose for a second straight month in October, government data showed on Friday, as the recent slump in U.S.-bound shipments eased.】

item.title: 新加坡第三季度国内生产总值同比增长 4.2%，上调 2025 年预期
item.description: 由于第三季度国内生产总值增长超出市场预期和初步估计，新加坡周五上调了2025年的经济展望。【原文：Singapore on Friday upgraded its economic outlook for 2025 as third-quarter gross domestic product growth beat market expectations and initial estimates.】

item.title: 向中国走私人工智能芯片的指控引发美国对芯片追踪的呼吁
item.description: 美国司法部指控四人参与了向中国非法出口英伟达人工智能芯片的计划，这促使一位重要的众议院共和党人在周四呼吁紧急通过一项芯片追踪法案。【原文：The U.S. Justice Department has charged four people in a scheme to illegally export Nvidia AI chips to China, prompting a key House Republican to call for urgent passage of a chip-tracking bill on Thursday.】

item.title: 对美联储 12 月利率决议持 "谨慎 "态度 = 费城联储主席
item.description: 12 月 20 日，美国费城地区联储主席保尔森支持美联储最近两次降息，但表示他将在 12 月的下一次政策会议上保持 "谨慎"，称需要在长期高通胀威胁和失业率上升风险之间取得平衡。【原文：米フィラデルフィア地区連銀のポールソン総裁は２０日、連邦準備理事会（ＦＲＢ）の過去２回の利下げを支持したものの、高インフレ長期化の脅威と失業率上昇リスクの間でバランスを取る必要があるとし、次回１２月の政策会合に「慎重に」臨む考えを示した。】

item.title: 投资者对 3G Capital 的 Skechers 交易价格的质疑纷至沓来
item.description: 据法庭记录显示，持有鞋业巨头斯凯奇（Skechers）数百万股股票的投资公司正在提起诉讼，要求获得比 3G Capital 在 94 亿美元的交易中收购该公司时支付的每股 63 美元更优惠的价格。【原文：Investment firms holding millions of shares of footwear giant Skechers are suing for a better deal than the $63 per share price paid by 3G Capital to take over the company in a $9.4 billion deal, according to court records.】

item.title: 消息人士称，派拉蒙、康卡斯特和 Netflix 提交了对华纳兄弟 Discovery 的竞标书
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的消息人士透露，华纳兄弟发现公司已收到派拉蒙、康卡斯特和 Netflix 对该媒体公司的初步竞标。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery has received preliminary bids for the media company from Paramount Skydance , Comcast and Netflix , according to a source familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 富士康与 OpenAI 在人工智能硬件制造领域开展合作
item.description: 富士康（Foxconn）周四表示，该台湾公司将与美国的 OpenAI 合作设计和制造数据中心机架、组件和其他人工智能硬件，两家公司都在寻求利用人工智能基础设施的蓬勃需求。【原文：Foxconn will collaborate with U.S.-based OpenAI to design and engineer data center racks, components, and other artificial intelligence hardware, the Taiwanese company said on Thursday, as both firms seek to capitalize on booming demand for AI infrastructure.】

item.title: 中国私募房地产投资信托基金为房地产企业提供新的融资途径
item.description: 中国新兴的私募房地产投资信托市场已成为资金短缺的开发商难得的亮点，在投资者对更高收益率的需求不断增长的推动下，今年的募资额达到创纪录的 120 亿美元。【原文：China's nascent private REIT market has emerged as a rare bright spot for cash-strapped developers, with a record fundraising pipeline of $12 billion for this year, driven by rising investor demand for higher yields.】

item.title: 富士康每年将在人工智能领域投入多达 30 亿美元，董事长认为中国电动车行业将面临洗牌
item.description: 全球最大的合约电子制造商富士康的负责人告诉路透社，富士康每年将在人工智能领域投资 20 亿至 30 亿美元。【原文：Foxconn will invest $2 billion to $3 billion a year in AI, the head of the world's largest contract electronics maker told Reuters.】

item.title: Joby Aviation 就商业机密起诉空中出租车竞争对手 Archer
item.description: 根据周四公开的一份诉状，电动空中出租车公司 Joby Aviation 在加利福尼亚州法院起诉竞争对手 Archer Aviation，指控其窃取了该公司的商业机密。【原文：Electric air-taxi company Joby Aviation has sued rival Archer Aviation in California state court for allegedly stealing its trade secrets, according to a complaint made public on Thursday.】

item.title: 二手车需求疲软，Copart 收入不及预期
item.description: 受需求疲软和二手车价值下跌的影响，在线汽车拍卖公司 Copart 周四公布的第一季度营收低于华尔街预期。【原文：Online vehicle auction company Copart reported first-quarter revenue below Wall Street estimates on Thursday, hurt by weak demand and falling vehicle values for used cars.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会驳回针对 SolarWinds 和其高级安全官员的起诉
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission）周四表示，已撤销对 SolarWinds 公司及其高级安全官的密切关注的诉讼。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission on Thursday said it has dropped its closely watched litigation against SolarWinds Corp and its top security officer that was tied to a Russia-linked cyberattack involving the software firm.】

item.title: 交易日 英伟达光芒不再，华尔街遭受重创
item.description: 华尔街周四经历了过山车般的狂飙，开盘时因人工智能巨头英伟达（Nvidia）再次发布强劲财报而大幅走高，但随着投资者重新评估这种乐观情绪以及政府停摆结束后首次公布的美国就业数据发出的喜忧参半的信号，华尔街最终深幅收红。【原文：Wall Street experienced a wild rollercoaster ride on Thursday, opening sharply higher on another set of strong results from artificial intelligence giant Nvidia, only to end deep in the red as investors reassessed that optimism and mixed signals from the first U.S. jobs data since the government shutdown ended.】

item.title: 特朗普签署取消巴西部分农产品进口关税的命令
item.description: 白宫表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周四签署了一项行政命令，取消11月13日之后对从巴西进口的某些农产品征收的部分关税。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump signed an executive order on Thursday to remove some tariffs on certain agricultural products imported from Brazil after November 13, the White House said.】

item.title: 消息称连锁餐厅加州比萨厨房将被投资集团收购
item.description: 据熟知内情的消息人士透露，加州比萨厨房（California Pizza Kitchen）已签署协议，将被由 Consortium Brand Partners 牵头的投资集团收购，其中包括 Todd Boehly 的投资公司 Eldridge Industries，收购价格低于 3 亿美元。【原文：California Pizza Kitchen has signed a deal to be acquired by an investor group led by Consortium Brand Partners and including Todd Boehly's investment firm Eldridge Industries, for under $300 million, according to sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：美国银行搁置 200 亿美元救助阿根廷计划
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周四援引消息人士的话报道，摩根大通、美国银行和花旗集团计划向阿根廷提供的 200 亿美元救助计划已被搁置，银行家们转而寻求规模较小的短期贷款方案。【原文：A planned $20 billion bailout to Argentina from JPMorgan Chase , Bank of America and Citigroup has been shelved as bankers pivot instead to a smaller, short-term loan package, the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday, citing sources.】

item.title: 因折扣商品需求强劲，罗斯百货上调年度利润预期
item.description: 罗斯百货公司（Ross Stores）周四上调了年度利润预期，在宏观经济不确定性迫在眉睫的情况下，该公司押注于节假日前对其折扣服装和配饰的强劲需求。【原文：Ross Stores raised its annual profit forecast on Thursday, betting on resilient demand for its discounted apparel and accessories ahead of the holiday season amid looming macroeconomic uncertainties.】

item.title: 马斯克的 X 公司结束了对律师事务所 Wachtell 的 9000 万美元诉讼
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的社交媒体平台 X 已经结束了对精英律师事务所 Wachtell, Lipton, Rosen & Katz 的诉讼，该诉讼旨在追回该事务所因挫败马斯克数十亿美元收购 Twitter 而获得的 9000 万美元酬金的大部分。【原文：Elon Musk’s social media platform X has ended its lawsuit against elite law firm Wachtell, Lipton, Rosen & Katz that sought to recover most of a $90 million fee the firm received for defeating Musk's bid to walk away from his multibillion-dollar purchase of Twitter.】

item.title: 扎克伯格与 Meta 董事就股东隐私案达成 1.9 亿美元和解协议
item.description: 根据周四公布的一份和解协议，马克-扎克伯格（Mark Zuckerberg）和 Meta Platforms 的现任及前任领导人同意向公司支付 1.9 亿美元，以解决股东对他们侵犯 Facebook 用户隐私权、损害 Meta 公司利益的指控。【原文：Mark Zuckerberg and current and former leaders of Meta Platforms agreed to pay the company $190 million to resolve shareholder allegations that they damaged Meta by violating Facebook users' privacy, according to a settlement unveiled on Thursday.】

item.title: 受市场需求推动，Gap 季度销售额和利润超出预期
item.description: 受 Old Navy 和 Banana Republic 品牌服装市场需求强劲的影响，Gap 周四公布的第三季度可比销售额和利润超出华尔街预期。【原文：Gap beat Wall Street expectations for third-quarter comparable sales and profit on Thursday, helped by strong marketing-driven demand for its Old Navy and Banana Republic brand apparel.】

item.title: CBO 称，特朗普关税将使美国赤字减少 1 万亿美元，少于此前估计
item.description: 据无党派的国会预算办公室周四估计，如果唐纳德-特朗普总统对从外国进口的商品加征关税的政策维持到2035年，将使美国赤字减少3万亿美元，而不是该机构在8月份预测的4万亿美元。【原文：President Donald Trump's tariff increases on imports from foreign countries will reduce U.S. deficits by $3 trillion if they are maintained through 2035, the non-partisan Congressional Budget Office estimated on Thursday, instead of the $4 trillion the agency projected in August.】

item.title: BETA 科技公司与近地公司合作，加速自主飞行器的开发
item.description: 电动飞机制造商贝塔科技公司（BETA Technologies）周四表示，该公司正与近地自治公司（Near Earth Autonomy）合作为军方开发无人驾驶飞机，并计划于2026年上半年开始飞行测试。【原文：Electric aircraft maker BETA Technologies said on Thursday it is partnering with Near Earth Autonomy to develop uncrewed aircraft for the military, with flight testing slated to begin in the first half of 2026.】

item.title: 美联储主席古尔斯比对降息感到不安，称持异议并无不妥
item.description: 芝加哥联储主席奥斯汀-古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）周四表示，面对过高的通胀率，他对降息感到不安。【原文：Chicago Federal Reserve President Austan Goolsbee on Thursday said he is uneasy about cutting interest rates in the face of too-high inflation that's steady at best and by some measures getting worse, remarks that signal a reluctance to support a third straight reduction in borrowing costs next month.】

item.title: 财务工具需求强劲，Intuit 预计季度收入增长将高于预期
item.description: Intuit 周四预测第二季度收入增长将超过华尔街预期，这表明市场对其人工智能财务管理工具的需求不断增长。【原文：Intuit forecast second-quarter revenue growth above Wall Street estimates on Thursday, a sign of growing demand for its artificial intelligence-powered financial management tools.】

item.title: 美国立法者瞄准 CHIPS 法案资助对象进口的中国芯片制造设备
item.description: 美国两党议员周四在众议院提出了一项法案，该法案将在 10 年内阻止 CHIPS 法案资助对象购买中国芯片制造设备。【原文：A bipartisan group of U.S. lawmakers introduced a bill on Thursday in the House that would block the purchase of Chinese chipmaking equipment by CHIPS Act grant recipients for 10 years.】

item.title: Lucid 推出更便宜的 Gravity 电动 SUV，以扩大吸引力
item.description: Lucid集团周四推出了起价为7.99万美元的Gravity SUV廉价版，这家豪华电动汽车制造商希望在美国电动汽车销售放缓的情况下扩大受众范围。【原文：Lucid Group on Thursday launched a cheaper variant of its Gravity SUV with a starting price of $79,900, as the luxury electric-vehicle maker seeks to reach a broader audience amid slowing EV sales in United States.】

item.title: 欧盟正就 Grok 上的仇恨言论内容与 X 联系
item.description: 欧盟正在就 X's Grok 上的仇恨言论内容与社交媒体网络 X 联系，欧盟认为这些内容 "令人震惊"，违背了欧洲人权价值观。【原文：The European Union is in touch with social media network X regarding hate speech content on X's Grok, which the EU described as 'appalling' and going against European human rights values.】

item.title: 比特币熊市占主导地位：年底价格跌破 90,000 美元的几率上升
item.description: 在线期权平台Derive.xyz的数据显示，比特币年底跌破9万美元的可能性已升至50%，因为交易员们加大了对全球最大加密货币下跌的对冲力度。【原文：The likelihood of bitcoin ending the year below $90,000 has risen to 50%, according to online options platform Derive.xyz, as traders ramped up hedging against more declines in the world's largest cryptocurrency.】

item.title: 美联储主席古尔斯比重申对降息感到不安
item.description: 芝加哥联储主席奥斯坦-古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）周四重申，他对提前降息感到 "不安"，尤其是在通胀率向美联储2%的目标迈进的过程中似乎已经停滞不前，并开始走错路。【原文：Chicago Federal Reserve President Austan Goolsbee repeated on Thursday he is "uneasy" about frontloading interest-rate cuts, particularly with progress on inflation towards the Fed's 2% goal looking to have stalled and starting to go the wrong way.】
